verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G321><s%> led up <S%G321><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> he had fasted <S%G3522><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> nights, <S%G3571><s%> he was <S%G3983><s%> hungry <S%G3983><s%> afterward. <S%G5305><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> tempter <S%G3985><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> command <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> become bread. <S%G740><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered, <S%G611><s%> "It <S%G2036><s%> is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G444><s%> 'Man shall <S%G2198><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G1223><s%> of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city. <S%G4172><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> set <S%G2476><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> throw <S%G906><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1781><s%> 'He will put his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> of you. <S%G4675><s%>' and, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909><s%> 'On their hands <S%G5495><s%> they will bear <S%G142><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> up, <S%G142><s%> so that <S%G3379><s%> you don't <S%G4350><s%> dash your <S%G4675><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>'"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Again, <S%G3825><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1598><s%> 'You shall not <S%G3756><s%> test <S%G1598><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G3880><s%> an <S%G1519><s%> exceedingly <S%G3029><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "I will give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of these things, <S%G5023><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will fall down <S%G4098><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Get <S%G3004><s%> behind me, <S%G4567><s%> Satan! For <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G4352><s%> 'You shall worship the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you shall serve <S%G3000><s%> him <S%G846><s%> only. <S%G3441><s%>'"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> left <S%G863><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G1247><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> up, <S%G402><s%> he withdrew into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

Leaving <S%G2641><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lived <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is by the sea, <S%G3864><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the region <S%G3725><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Naphtali, <S%G3508><s%>
that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"The land <S%G1093><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Naphtali, <S%G3508><s%> toward <S%G3598><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%G1093><s%>

the people <S%G2992><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> light, <S%G5457><s%> to those <S%G846><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the region <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> to them light <S%G5457><s%> has dawned. <S%G393><s%>"

From <S%G575><s%> that time, <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to preach, <S%G2784><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> "Repent! <S%G3340><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand. <S%G1448><s%>"

Walking <S%G4043><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brothers: <S%G80><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea; <S%G2281><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> fishermen. <S%G231><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Come <S%G1205><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> for men. <S%G444><s%>"
They <S%G863><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> their nets <S%G1350><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Going <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G4260><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> their <S%G846><s%> nets. <S%G1350><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
They immediately <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G2532><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of the Kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> healing <S%G2323><s%> every disease and <S%G2532><s%> every sickness <S%G3554><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> report <S%G189><s%> about him <S%G846><s%> went <S%G565><s%> out <S%G1519><s%> into all <S%G3956><s%> Syria. <S%G4947><s%> They brought <S%G4374><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G2192><s%> were <S%G2560><s%> sick, <S%G4912><s%> afflicted with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torments, <S%G931><s%> possessed with demons, <S%G1139><s%> epileptics, <S%G4583><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> paralytics; <S%G3885><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Great multitudes <S%G4183><s%> from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> Decapolis, <S%G1179><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
